movie.title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
movie.plot: A year after his father's death, Oskar, a troubled young boy, discovers a mysterious key he believes was left for him by his father and embarks on a scavenger hunt to find the matching lock.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 23 nominations.

events.title: Oskar's father dies in the World Trade Center attack
